name: desafio-fullstack-java
description: Bem vindo ao desafio *Fullstack - Java do Desenvolvimento Jur√≠dico*.

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontendAngular" "npm run start:frontendVite"
scripts.start:backend: cd Backend && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:frontendAngular: cd frontend && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:frontendVite: cd frontend-vite && npm install && npm run dev
